1: The Lord is the one who is shepherding me; I lack nothing.
2: He causes me to lie down in pastures of green grass; he guides me beside quiet waters.
3: He revives my life; he leads me in pathways that are righteous for the sake of his name.[a]
4: Even when I walk through a valley of deep darkness,[b] I will not be afraid because you are with me. Your rod and your staff—they comfort me.
5: You prepare a table before me, even in the presence of my enemies. You anoint my head with oil; my cup overflows.
6: Truly, goodness and gracious love will pursue me all the days of my life, and I will remain in[c] the Lord's Temple forever.[d]
